resources.string: Immerse yourself in Scandinavian splendor as you zigzag to 3 breathtaking ports of call. Refresh and recharge during your days at sea with countless onboard amenities

Revel in a diverse getaway that blends first-rate amenities with extraordinary destinations. A day at sea gives you a chance to enjoy the lively entertainment, themed dining and fun recreational activities aboard.
Roam the bustling streets of Dover - before or after - your roundtrip escapade to a diverse collection of maritime towns. Fascinating stopovers include Liverpool, Edinburgh and Dublin.

Enter jet-set mode on a roundtrip cruise from buzzing Barcelona that takes you to jaw-dropping locales across Italy and France. A day at sea gives you a chance to enjoy the lively entertainment, themed dining and fun recreational activities aboard.
Sleeps 3 to 4 \n184 sq ft \nNo Exterior View
Sleeps 3 to 4 \n214 sq ft \n1 Large Porthole or 2 Small Portholes
Sleeps 5 \n304 sq ft Including Verandah \nPrivate Verandah
Sleeps 7 \n945 sq ft Including Verandah \nPrivate Verandah
